item.title: Banana Flour Pancakes
item.description: Adapted from the back of some packet somewhere Ingredients 1 cup of banana flour 1 mashed banana ⅓ cup flour 2 tsp baking powder 1 tsp vanilla essense ⅓ brown sugar 2 eggs (beaten) 1½ oat milk Prep Whisk all the ingredients together. Heat a pan. Put grease/oil/butter in pan. Cook pancakes.
